scripts.build:at.js: mkdir -p plugins_public/at.js; cd node_modules/at.js; cp -r dist/* ../../plugins_public/at.js
scripts.build:codemirror: mkdir -p plugins_public/codemirror; cd node_modules/codemirror; cp -r lib/* ../../plugins_public/codemirror; uglifyjs lib/codemirror.js mode/clike/clike.js mode/coffeescript/coffeescript.js mode/commonlisp/commonlisp.js mode/css/css.js mode/diff/diff.js mode/dtd/dtd.js mode/fortran/fortran.js mode/go/go.js mode/htmlembedded/htmlembedded.js mode/htmlmixed/htmlmixed.js mode/javascript/javascript.js mode/lua/lua.js mode/markdown/markdown.js mode/pascal/pascal.js mode/perl/perl.js mode/php/php.js mode/properties/properties.js mode/python/python.js mode/ruby/ruby.js mode/sass/sass.js mode/shell/shell.js mode/sql/sql.js mode/sparql/sparql.js mode/turtle/turtle.js mode/vb/vb.js mode/vbscript/vbscript.js mode/xml/xml.js mode/xquery/xquery.js mode/yaml/yaml.js addon/edit/matchbrackets.js -c -m > ../../plugins_public/codemirror/codemirror-ext.min.js; uglifyjs lib/codemirror.js -c -m > ../../plugins_public/codemirror/codemirror.min.js
scripts.build:croppie: mkdir -p plugins_public/croppie; cd node_modules/croppie; cp -r croppie.* ../../plugins_public/croppie
scripts.build:fancybox: mkdir -p plugins_public/fancybox; cd node_modules/fancybox/dist; cp -r css/* ../../../plugins_public/fancybox; cp -r helpers ../../../plugins_public/fancybox; cp -r img/* ../../../plugins_public/fancybox; cp -r js/* ../../../plugins_public/fancybox
scripts.build:filepond: mkdir -p plugins_public/filepond; cd node_modules/filepond; cp -r dist/filepond.min.* ../../plugins_public/filepond; cp -r locale ../../plugins_public/filepond; cd ../../plugins_public/filepond; cp ../../node_modules/filepond-plugin-file-validate-size/dist/filepond-plugin-file-validate-size.min.js .; cp ../../node_modules/filepond-plugin-file-validate-type/dist/filepond-plugin-file-validate-type.min.js .; cp ../../node_modules/filepond-plugin-image-crop/dist/filepond-plugin-image-crop.min.js .; cp ../../node_modules/filepond-plugin-image-preview/dist/filepond-plugin-image-preview.min.* .; cp ../../node_modules/filepond-plugin-image-resize/dist/filepond-plugin-image-resize.min.js .; cp ../../node_modules/filepond-plugin-image-transform/dist/filepond-plugin-image-transform.min.js .
scripts.build:flag-icons: mkdir -p plugins_public/flag-icons; cd node_modules/flag-icons; cp -r css ../../plugins_public/flag-icons; cp -r flags ../../plugins_public/flag-icons
scripts.build:flatpickr: mkdir -p plugins_public/flatpickr; cd node_modules/flatpickr; cp -r dist ../../plugins_public/flatpickr
scripts.build:flickity: mkdir -p plugins_public/flickity; cd node_modules/flickity; cp -r dist/flickity.css ../../plugins_public/flickity; cp -r dist/flickity.pkgd.min.js ../../plugins_public/flickity
scripts.build:fullcalendar: mkdir -p plugins_public/fullcalendar/locales; cd node_modules/@fullcalendar/core; cp index.global.min.js ../../../plugins_public/fullcalendar; cp locales/*.min.js ../../../plugins_public/fullcalendar/locales
scripts.build:grapesjs: mkdir -p plugins_public/grapesjs; cd plugins_public/grapesjs; cp ../../node_modules/grapesjs/dist/grapes.min.js .; cp ../../node_modules/grapesjs/dist/css/grapes.min.css .; cp ../../node_modules/grapesjs-blocks-basic/dist/index.js grapesjs-blocks-basic.js; cp ../../node_modules/grapesjs-preset-newsletter/dist/index.js grapesjs-preset-newsletter.min.js; cp ../../node_modules/grapesjs-preset-webpage/dist/index.js grapesjs-preset-webpage.min.js; cp ../../node_modules/grapesjs-style-bg/dist/index.js grapesjs-style-bg.js
scripts.build:highlight.js: mkdir -p plugins_public/highlight; cd node_modules/highlight.js; npm i; npm run build-browser; cp build/highlight.min.js ../../plugins_public/highlight; npm run build-cdn; cp build/styles/default.min.css ../../plugins_public/highlight
scripts.build:htmx: mkdir -p plugins_public/htmx; cd plugins_public/htmx; cp ../../node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.min.js .; cp ../../node_modules/htmx.org/dist/ext/head-support.js .; cp ../../node_modules/htmx.org/dist/ext/preload.js .
scripts.build:jquery-minicolors: mkdir -p plugins_public/jquery-minicolors; cd node_modules/@claviska/jquery-minicolors; cp jquery.minicolors.* ../../../plugins_public/jquery-minicolors
scripts.build:jquery: mkdir -p plugins_public/jquery; cd plugins_public/jquery; cp ../../node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.* .; cp ../../node_modules/jquery-migrate/dist/jquery-migrate.min.* .
scripts.build:marka: mkdir -p plugins_public/marka; cd plugins_public/marka; cp ../../node_modules/marka/dist/css/* .; cp ../../node_modules/marka/dist/js/* .
scripts.build:ovenplayer: mkdir -p plugins_public/ovenplayer; cd plugins_public/ovenplayer; cp ../../node_modules/ovenplayer/dist/* .; cp ../../node_modules/dashjs/dist/dash.all.min.* .; cp ../../node_modules/hls.js/dist/hls.min.* .
scripts.build:pdfjs: mkdir -p plugins_public/pdfjs; cd plugins_public/pdfjs; cp ../../node_modules/pdfjs-dist/legacy/build/pdf.min.mjs pdf.min.mjs.js; cp ../../node_modules/pdfjs-dist/legacy/build/pdf.worker.min.mjs pdf.worker.min.mjs.js
scripts.build:prismjs: mkdir -p plugins_public/prism; cd plugins_public/prism; echo '/* https://prismjs.com/download.html?#themes=prism&languages=markup+css+clike+javascript+markup-templating+php */' > prism.js; cd ../../node_modules/prismjs/components; echo '' > nl; cat prism-core.min.js nl prism-markup.min.js nl prism-css.min.js nl prism-clike.min.js nl prism-javascript.min.js nl prism-markup-templating.min.js nl prism-php.min.js >> ../../../plugins_public/prism/prism.js; cp ../themes/prism.min.css ../../../plugins_public/prism/prism.css
scripts.build:quill: mkdir -p plugins_public/quill; cd plugins_public/quill; cp -r ../../node_modules/quill/dist/* .; cp -r ../../node_modules/quill-mention/dist/* .; cp -r ../../node_modules/quill-emoji/dist/* .; cp -r ../../node_modules/quill-html-edit-button/dist/* .; cp -r ../../node_modules/quill-image-uploader/dist/quill.* .; cp -r ../../node_modules/quill-image-resize-module/image-resize.min.js .
scripts.build: npm run install-bower-components; npm run install-napa-components; npm-run-all --parallel build:*
